page.description: A list of form properties with examples.

case.title: Width
case.description: The width of the form in the unit of measure set in View > Settings > System > Layouts.

case.title: Height
case.description: The width of the form in the unit of measure set in View > Settings > System > Layouts.

case.title: Hide Status Bar
case.description: When checked, the Status Bar will not appear at the bottom of the form.

case.title: Restrictions
case.description: There are a number of possible restrictions:
The user's ability to switch to browse view.
The user's ability to enter edit records.
The user's ability to continuously enter new records.
The user's ability to delete records.
The user's ability to open or edit layouts.
The user's ability to enter new records.
The user's ability to use the function in the Find menu.
The user's ability to use the functions in Query menu.
The user's ability to use the first, previous, next, and last record commands.
The user's ability to use query commands.
The user's ability to use select a range of records.

case.title: Timer Interval
case.description: Sets the timer interval.

case.title: Form Icon
case.description: Sets the form icon.

case.title: Query Form
case.description: Sets the form used in Query by Form.

case.title: Companion Browse
case.description: Sets the browse displayed by pressing F8.

case.title: Table
case.description: The name of the table (or primary table in the case of set) that the form is bound to.

case.title: Filter Expression
case.description: An expression that selects records from the table or set.

case.title: Order Expression
case.description: An expression that orders selected records.

case.title: Background Style
case.description: The fill color mode and translucency of the form's background.

case.title: Fill
case.description: The style and color(s) of the form's background.
case.example: :formname.fill.backcolor as C :formname.fill.forecolor as C :formname.fill.style as C

case.title: Use Bitmap
case.description: When checked, allows a bitmap image to be used as the form's background.

case.title: Display Mode
case.description: If Bitmap is checked, sets the way the bitmap is displayed: "Absolute" (actual size), "Stretch" (fill the background, with potentially unequal scaling in horizontal and vertical dimensions), or "Best Fit" (largest size without distortion of the image).

case.title: Embedded
case.description: The name of the embedded image.

case.title: File
case.description: The name of a bitmap image file to use as a background.

case.title: Library
case.description: The name of the library image.

case.title: Left, Top
case.description: Sets the left and top coordinates of the window.

case.title: Width, Height
case.description: Sets the width and height dimensions of the window.

case.title: Mode and Value
case.description: If the mode of any of the Position or Size values is set to "Percentage", then the value is interpreted as a percentage of the Alpha Anywhere window. In all other cases, the values are in inches. If the mode of any of the Position or Size values is set to "Percentage", then the property setting is then "Percent". If the mode is set to "Inches" or "Cm", the value of the property setting is then "Absolute". If the mode is set to "Default, the value of the property setting is "Default". In this case the size of the form is set by the size of the form in the design window. If the mode is set to "Use Form Width" or "Use Form Height", the value of the property setting is "Form". In this case the size of the form is set by the size of the design window.
case.example: :formname.window.left_mode as C :formname.window.top_mode as C :formname.window.width_mode as C :formname.window.height_mode as C

case.title: Sizeable
case.description: When checked, the user can resize the form window.

case.title: System Menu
case.description: When checked, there is a system menu in the upper left corner of the form window.

case.title: Minimize Button
case.description: When checked, there is a minimize button in the upper right corner of the form window.

case.title: Maximize Button
case.description: When checked, there is a maximize button in the upper right corner of the form window.

case.title: Has Caption
case.description: When checked, the caption field is enabled.

case.title: Caption
case.description: The name of the form.

case.title: Frame Style
case.description: Sets the style of the window to "Form" (modeless), "Dialog" (modal), or "Tool" (?).

case.title: Left
case.description: The size of the left margin when printing the form.

case.title: Right
case.description: The size of the right margin when printing the form.

case.title: Top
case.description: The size of the top margin when printing the form.

case.title: Bottom
case.description: The size of the bottom margin when printing the form.

case.title: Forms on a page
case.description: Whether it is allowed to print more than one form on a page.

case.title: Printer Selection
case.description: Enables and disables the Printer drop-down list box.

case.title: Printer
case.description: Which printer to use.

case.title: Paper bin
case.description: Which paper bin on the printer to use.

case.title: Saved Properties
case.description: Refer to Setting Printer Options at Run Time.

case.title: Show printer setup
case.description: Whether the user should see the Print Setup dialog.

case.title: Print to file
case.description: The name of the print file to create.

case.title: Data Entry Style
case.description: Whether the form should use the "System default", "Modal", or "Modeless" data entry styles.

section.title: Menu and Toolbar Properties
section.description: Also refer to Right-Click Menus and Changing Custom Menus at Runtime.

case.title: View Menu
case.description: The standard menu to display.

case.title: View Right Click Menu
case.description: The standard right click menu to display.

case.title: Query by Form Menu
case.description: The menu to display in Query by Form mode.

case.title: Query by Form Right Click Menu
case.description: The right click menu to display in Query by Form mode.

case.title: Find by Form Menu
case.description: The menu to display in Find by Form mode.

case.title: Find by Form Right Click Menu
case.description: The right click menu to display in Find by Form mode.

case.title: View Toolbar
case.description: The standard toolbar to display.

case.title: Query by Form Toolbar
case.description: The toolbar to display in Find by Form mode.

case.title: Find by Form Toolbar
case.description: The toolbar to display in Find by Form mode.

case.title: Use Custom Help
case.description: Enables other fields on the tab.

case.title: Help Source File
case.description: Enables other fields on the tab.

case.title: Naming Convention
case.description: Enables other fields on the tab.

case.title: Help File Name
case.description: The path to and name of the compiled help file that contains the help topics.

case.title: Help Window Title
case.description: The title of the topic in an Alpha Anywhere help file.

case.title: Chapter Name
case.description: Included in the help filename.

case.title: Topic Name
case.description: The name of the help topic in a compiled help file.
